name: Samira El Gdachi
label: Ph.D. | Atmospheric Physics
summary: Atmospheric physicist (Ph.D.) specialized in boundary layer processes and mountain clouds, with experience in high-resolution atmospheric modeling (Meso-NH, LIMA microphysics), aerosol–cloud–radiation interactions, scientific computing (Python, R, Fortran 90), and analysis of observational and model datasets.
